meanings.definition: A person who is knowledgeable about books.
meanings.sent1: The bookmen at the library helped me find a good mystery novel.
meanings.sent2: The bookmen in the bookstore recommended a classic novel to me.
meanings.sent3: The bookmen had a bookish debate about the best author in history.
meanings.sent4: Among the bookmen, she stood out as a walking encyclopedia of literature.
meanings.sent5: The bookmen's passion for books was contagious, inspiring everyone around them.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are involved in the book industry.
meanings.sent1: The bookmen gathered at the publishing house to discuss the latest bestsellers.
meanings.sent2: The bookmen collaborated on a project to promote reading in schools.
meanings.sent3: The bookmen organized a book fair that attracted book lovers from all over.
meanings.sent4: In the world of publishing, the bookmen were the unsung heroes behind every bestseller.
meanings.sent5: The bookmen's dedication to spreading the love of reading was truly admirable.
